description: this dashboard helps to view stats of aerospike-server & exporter running in Kubernetes  using exporter tools like kube-state-metrics and cadvisor

options.content:
NOTE:
This dashboard requires Kube-state-metrics(KSM) and CAdvisor to be installed.
If KSM is not configured, overview(KSM) Row will be blank and if CAdvisor is not configured, Pod(CAdvisor) Row will be blank.
Pod count in Overview(KSM) Row is cumulative of all pods in namespace irrespective of Aerospike cluster.

panels.description: Cumulative count of pods in namespace irrespective of Aerospike cluster
panels.title: Pod Count

panels.description: Time since when namespace is created
panels.title: k8s Namespace Created

panels.description: Status of container in pod Running/Terminated/Waiting/Restarts
panels.title: Pod Container Status

panels.description: Namespace status is active/terminating
panels.title: k8s Namespace Status

panels.description: Pod state is Failed/Pending/Running/Succeeded/Unknown
panels.title: Pod State

panels.description: Pod state Running/Failed/Pending/Succeeded/Unknown in Time series
panels.title: Pod State

panels.description: Status of container in pod Running/Terminated/Waiting in Time series
panels.title: Pod Container Status

panels.description: Rate of container restarts  in pod (Timeseries)
panels.title: Pod Container Restarts Total (rate)

panels.description: Persistent volume count

panels.title: Ulimit(soft)
